room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: From the very start I knew this would be great experience! The guy who answered the phone and helped with my reservation was awesome so helpful and courteous. Had to make 2 calls after that and both times the 2 ladies were very helpful and informative. Our group had a blast solving the puzzle of Mystery Mansion! Definitely will return to do another! North Hills staff you are awesome and we had great time!! Thank you for making sure we felt welcome and important!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We went with a group of friends. The escape room was great, with well thought out puzzles and an entertaining story line. Our guide Matt made sure it was fun for all. I definitely recommend this place.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Their new game is so much fun! The employee that ran our game was cheerful and nice even though we were last game of the night. Overall awesome experience!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We had our great experience at Breakout in North Hills (McKnight Road) and had so much fun. We had a group of 8 (max) and never felt overcrowded in any room. Each person contributed in some way to solving the puzzle to move on to the next part. We did an intermediate level - Mystery Mansion. Yes, we did ask for a hint or so and yes we did get out. JUST BARELY! Lots of Fun. You are not locked in and are monitored at all times for any emergencies. I can't wait to do another.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We went as a staff and had a really great time. Rooms were clean and everything was well put together! We didnâ€™t quite make it but it was still a great experience. Dominic was our game master- very friendly and gave us clues without spoiling the challenge. Hope to come back with the family! We chose the Mystery Mansion game.
